DOC.brief_summary: The study question : Does SNAP-Index ( SI ) correlate well OASS BIS Monitor sedation ketamine ? The study hypothesis : Since SNAP II monitor seem responsive emergence anesthesia , good correlation OASS BIS monitor use ketamine .
DOC.brief_title: SNAP VS BIS ( OAA/S ) Scale During Sedation Regimen With Without Ketamine
DOC.criteria: Age : 1864 year ASA : IIII Procedure : Breast gynecological surgery Anesthesia : Monitored anesthesia care Pregnancy Breast Feeding Body Mass Index > 35kg/m2 Drug Alcohol abuse Use anticonvulsants History CVA Dropout criterion : Patient surgeon request Conversion general anesthesia Inability obtain data monitor
